entry.title: Proposal to replace BIP0039
entry.summary: In this email exchange, Marek is asking Thomas Voegtlin to elaborate on the meaning of "version bits" in relation to Electrum's algorithm for searching branches. Marek suggests that these version bits should be covered by the specification to ensure cross-compatibility between clients. Thomas provides a link to a simple implementation and some ideas on how to format the metadata. The email thread ends with a promotion for October webinars on accelerating application performance and a reminder of the Bitcoin-development mailing list.
